content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

1->2->7->8

This is the shortest path from node 4 (the starting point) to node 8 (the target point) in the given graph. The path includes the nodes 4, 2, 7, and 8, and it is the shortest route that avoids other nodes in the graph.

1->2->7

This is the shortest path from node 4 (the starting point) to node 7 (the target point) in the given graph. The path includes the nodes 4, 2, and 7, and it is the shortest route that avoids other nodes in the graph.
